title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: When searching for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the first match is not selected. To reproduce this issue, search for references to the field and double-click on the search result.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: After double-clicking on the search result, the first match should be selected.
SR: The expected behavior is for the first match to be automatically selected when double-clicking on a search result.
